10/advancedMove farmer false 0 1 3 0 4 10/showFrame Cirrus 0/advancedMove Cirrus false 0 1/pause 1000/speak Mateo "Are you alright?$78"/speak Cirrus "Yeah, I'd say I'm used to it, but... honestly, I At her house. Her shows are my shows.$16"/speak Mateo "Oh, duh...$12"/emote Cirrus 32/pause 250/changeName Cirrus Coriander/speak Cirrus "My stage name is Cirrus! I'm a solo act musician. But I'd prefer you call me Coriander. Or Cori, for short!$1"/playMusic shimmeringbastion/speak Mateo "Well, it's a pleasure to meet you, Coriander.$1"/pause 250/textAboveHead Hector "Indeed."/pause 250/speak Mateo "This is @, this is Hector, and I'm {{Mateo Name}}."/speak Cirrus "Well, thank you, @ and Hector and {{Mateo Name}}, for the rescue. I think I might take this chance to slip out, East Scarp is calling me after all this...$1#$b#...excitement.$3"/speak Hector "Hey, that's where we live. Want us to walk with you? Pinky swear I'll chase off anyone else that gets too close.$1"/textAboveHead Mateo "Hector-"/pause 250/speak Cirrus "That sounds great, actually! Thank you.$17"/emote Cirrus 20 true/emote farmer 32 true/emote Hector 56 true/emote Mateo 56/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Mateo "You just wanted to get out of the Saloon, didn't you?$13"/speak Hector "Nooo, I'm doing our new friend a kindness. Obviously.$8"/speak Cirrus "New friend...? $1"/pause 250/end

Cori is our best mate, we go way back.$12#$b#We were meant to be waiting for her but Dylan slowed us down.$10"/emote Nova.Dylan 16 true/jump Nova.Dylan/speak Nova.Dylan "{{i18n:Events.Events.ED.SnS.Ch3.EnD.Nova.Dylan.08}}"/textAboveHead Hector "{{i18n:Events.Events.ED.SnS.Ch3.EnD.Hector.09}}"/advancedMove Cirrus false 0 1 3 10/pause 1500/speak Cirrus "C'mere, Dylan! Hugs for you, too.$1"/speak Nova.Dylan "Oh go on then, if you must... it's good to see you again, Cori.$3"/pause 250/positionOffset Cirrus -40 0/showFrame Nova.Dylan 28/showFrame Cirrus 39/shake Nova.Dylan 1000 true/shake Cirrus 1000 true/emote Nova.Eli 32 true/pause 250/emote farmer 32/showFrame Nova.Dylan 4 true/playSound dwop/shake Cirrus 200/warp Cirrus 32 19/faceDirection Cirrus 3/pause 250/speak Hector "{{i18n:Events.Events.ED.SnS.Ch3.EnD.Hector.12}}"/faceDirection Cirrus 1/speak Cirrus "I should be good! We were planning to play some arcade games and then go back to their place.$1"/faceDirection Cirrus 3/speak Nova.Dylan "You lot can feel free to join us. It sounded like you were getting on well with Cori before we showed up.$1"/jump Nova.Eli 5 true/faceDirection Cirrus 0/speak Nova.Eli "Yeah! We can ask Gus for a few pizzas to go. Hope you've got some of your famous ginger beer to pair with them, Cori.$1"/speak Cirrus "Of course I do!$1"/emote Hector 32 true/faceDirection Cirrus 2/speak Mateo "{{i18n:Events.Events.ED.SnS.Ch3.EnD.Mateo.16}}"/jump Hector 5 true/faceDirection Cirrus 1/speak Hector "{{i18n:Events.Events.ED.SnS.Ch3.EnD.Hector.17}}"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/speak Sam "{{i18n:Events.Events.ED.SnS.Ch3.EnD.Sam.20}}"/speak Abigail "Right?? Eli never told me he's besties with THE Cirrus!$7"/speak Sebastian "I feel bad for offering her a beer...$2"/message "Cori brightened up with the company of her friends, new and old. Her house is located in the northern part of East Scarp Village!"/pause 250/end
